mapper.select: select b.user_no as userNo, b.title, a.name, b.hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth, b.no from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc limit #{page}, #{boardDisplay}
select b.user_no as userNo, b.title, a.name, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNO, b.depth, b.no, b.contents from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no and b.no = #{no }
